name: Michael Douglas Quiz Challenge - How Much Do You Know? |     Celebrities

questions.text: Douglas starred in 'Disclosure'. Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Michael Crichton.

	Good movie that didn't do that well. With Demi Moore, Donald Sutherland (and Dennis Miller). Ezsterhas did the script for 'Basic Instinct'.

questions.text: Although not a 'Michael Douglas movie', Douglas had a role in 'The China Syndrome'. What was it?
questions.explanation:
Member of the news team.

	Very good movie. With Jane Fonda and Jack Lemmon.

questions.text: Douglas starred in 'The American President'. Who played his political opponent?
questions.explanation:
Richard Dreyfuss.

	Extremely pleasant. All of the choices were in the cast (along with Annette Bening). Aaron Sorkin script.

questions.text: 'Black Rain' was set in what country?
Douglas had an unusual role in 'Falling Down'. Who was also in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Tuesday Weld.

	It was Weld - but as an older woman, rather than as the young beauty of earlier days. Landers was in 'Chorus Line'. Moore was in 'Disclosure'. Griffith was in 'Shining Through'.

questions.text: Who played the wife in 'Fatal Attraction'?
questions.explanation:
Anne Archer.

	Close was the 'other woman' in the movie. Paltrow was in 'A Perfect Murder'. Turner was in 'Romancing the Stone'.

questions.text: 'Greed is good' comes from what movie?
questions.explanation:
'Wall Street'.

	One of his best movies.

questions.text: 'Shining Through' is a war movie. What war?
questions.explanation:
World War II.

	With Melanie Griffith. A bit hokey.

questions.text: Which song is from 'A Chorus Line'?
questions.explanation:
'What I Did For Love'.

	'Clowns' is from 'A Little Night Music'. 'Memory' is from 'Cats'. 'Music' is from 'Phantom of the Opera'.

questions.text: Which movie does NOT star Michael Douglas?
questions.explanation:
'Heroes of Telemark'.

	The three were 'lesser' movies by Douglas. 'Heroes' stars Kirk Douglas, not Michael.
